item.title: dataplex-search-entries
item.description:
About

A dataplex-search-entries tool returns all entries in Dataplex Catalog (e.g. tables, views, models) that matches given user query. It’s compatible with the following sources:

  • dataplex

dataplex-search-entries takes a required query parameter based on which entries are filtered and returned to the user and a required name parameter which is constructed using source’s project if user does not provide it explicitly and has the following format: projects/{project}/locations/global. It also optionally accepts following parameters:
